title: Read the problem.
text: Make sure all the words and ideas are understood. Draw a diagram to illustrate what is happening.
speech: Make sure all the words and ideas are understood. Draw a diagram to illustrate what is happening.
pacedSpeech: Make sure all the words and ideas are understood. Draw a diagram to illustrate what is happening.

title: Identify and name what we're looking for
text: We are looking for the time travelled. Both people will travel the same amount of distance.
speech: We are looking for the time travelled. Both people will travel the same amount of distance.
pacedSpeech: We are looking for the time travelled. Both people will travel the same amount of distance.

title: Translate into an equation
speech: 76 t plus 82 t is equal to 632
pacedSpeech: 76 t plus 82 t is equal to 632
